comments.author: Bitinity

Anyway, I created a throw away account without the link you provided in your post and I receive 100FS on Razor Shark with 20x wager requirement. It is better than the one you offer here 30FS on Tiki Tumble and with 30x wager requirement. The question is, can user claim the one you offer here after finish the one credited automatically after registration?

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on October 19, 2022, 06:29:53 AMcongrats bro, that's your luck, I also got 100 free spins but not as lucky as you, still not sure it can be withdrawn that winning fundYou can withdraw it once you complete the wagering requirement and you need to do it with real balance which means that you need to make deposit as said by zuzie previously. You can calculate yourself how much to wager and think whether it is worth or not to wager the required amount for that bonus. Good thing is that your cash balance will not be locked because the bonus balance is separated, so if you decide to deposit and wager but you are giving up for the wagering requirement, you can still withdraw your cash/real balance even if you have not completed the wagering requirement of the bonus.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: Bitinity on October 19, 2022, 08:23:09 AMYou can withdraw it once you complete the wagering requirement and you need to do it with real balance which means that you need to make deposit as said by zuzie previously. You can calculate yourself how much to wager and think whether it is worth or not to wager the required amount for that bonus. Good thing is that your cash balance will not be locked because the bonus balance is separated, so if you decide to deposit and wager but you are giving up for the wagering requirement, you can still withdraw your cash/real balance even if you have not completed the wagering requirement of the bonus. Free spins are distributed to give new users free chances to explore games and the casino. Those spins won't be allowed to use and win big then withdraw. It can cause exploitation on the casino bankroll. Logically it should not be allowed at the start in design of free spins.Wagering requirement is not easy to meet and when you meet it, it is harder to still maintain your profit from free-spin wins. With free spins, don't let the idea to withdraw if you win as your priority. Consider it is chance to spin and play for fun and knowing how one game is played on one casino.Question for Vavada.com casino.Do they intend to develop the casino as a Web3 casino that means user can connect their wallets to the casino and play with non custodial wallets? Web3 casino is a new trend.

comments.author: zuzie
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on October 19, 2022, 07:05:24 AMIf he is the owner of this casino, I'm sure he will make sure to address all the issues and will monitor this thread to answer all questions, he can do that because he has all the answersOften the casino will appoint a certain parties who will be trusted to help solve customer problems, including in this forum.
